features: Vacuum-insulated design provides superior heat and cold retention for up to 2 hours.
18/8 stainless steel provides unrivaled purity and durability.
Spill-resistant, sealable spout prevents loss of heat and coffee alike.
Non-slip foot helps keep cup upright and fits most car cup holders.
Includes: 17 fl. oz. Mug, Sealable Lid, Insulating Sleeve, Non-Slip Foot.
